# Yaswanth Sai Vendra - Portfolio Information for LLMs

## About
Name: Yaswanth Sai Vendra
Location: Bangalore, India
Profession: Full Stack Developer
Website: https://yashv.me
Email: yaswanthsaivendra@gmail.com

## Professional Summary
Yaswanth is a skilled Full Stack Developer based in Bangalore, India. He specializes in modern web technologies and creates engaging digital experiences. He's passionate about building innovative solutions and is currently available for freelance projects and collaborations.

## Technical Skills
- Frontend: React.js, JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js
- Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL
- Tools & Technologies: Git, Webpack, Vite, REST APIs
- Design: UI/UX Design, Responsive Design, Mobile-First Development
- Animation: Framer Motion, CSS Animations
- Other: EmailJS integration, PWA development, SEO optimization

## Specializations
- Full Stack Web Development
- User Interface (UI) Design
- User Experience (UX) Design
- Responsive Web Design
- Modern JavaScript Frameworks
- API Development and Integration
- Performance Optimization
- SEO and Web Analytics

## Projects & Work
Yaswanth has worked on various projects ranging from:
- Personal portfolio websites with modern animations and interactions
- Full-stack web applications with React and Node.js
- UI/UX design for web and mobile applications
- Integration of third-party services like EmailJS for contact forms
- SEO optimization and social media integration

## Current Focus
- Building modern, interactive web applications
- Creating beautiful and functional user interfaces
- Developing full-stack solutions for clients
- Freelance web development and design projects
- Open to collaborations and new opportunities

He's highly adaptable to different time zones and excels in remote collaboration. Based in Bangalore, India, but open to working with clients globally.
